name: Poxy
description:
We’re talking about a platform, run-n-gun game that will push the Player’s coordination above its limit:

- Play smart and fast in order to survive against the immune system.
- Paralize your enemies and parasite them in order to overcome obstacles.
- Survive inside your enemies or die alone against them.

Contex:
Poxy will take you to a journey inside the human body, fighting the immune system and passing through your organs in order to spread its disease!

DEVELOPED BY:

WE ARE TWERKING MONSTERS! (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 2, 2018/2019)
